text: [Music]
greetings my name is Matt word and I'm
here at AWS headquarters in Seattle to
give you an update on the Amazon simple
Q service sqs sqs is a fully managed
message queuing service for reliably
communicating between distributed
software components and microservices at
any scale sqs makes it simple to
decouple application components so they
can run and fail independently this sets
you build applications that are fault
tolerant and easy to scale now sqs
protects your data at rest with the
addition of serers side encryption
Amazon sqs server side encryption allows
you to exchange sensitive data between
applications using encrypted cues with
256 bit AES encryption between each
message the AWS Key Management Service
provides master key management and works
with AWS cloudrail to provide logs of
all encryption key usage to help meet
your Regulatory and compliance needs
this allows you to use sqs in
applications that exchange personally
identifiable information and other
confidential data such as Financial
Services e-commerce and Healthcare
applications for example Capital One is
using sqs with server side encryption to
migrate core banking applications to the
cloud there are no additional charges
for using Amazon sqs with encrypted cues
and you can get started today through
the AWS console or SDK of your choice
that's it thanks a lot
we
[Music]
